paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate the global convergence properties in probability of the Population-Based Incremental Learning (PBIL) algorithm when the initial configuration p((0)) is fixed and the learning rate a is close to zero. The convergence in probability of PBIL is confirmed by the experimental results. This paper presents a meaningful discussion on how to establish a unified convergence theory of PBIL that is not affected by the population and the selected individuals. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. paper_title: The convergence analysis and specification of the Population-Based Incremental Learning algorithm
